column1: Tell me why the hell people find the coronavirus funny. Get that shit off my damn feed and grow up.
The moment you thought this shit was funny is when we started talking about the coronavirus, since the tweet was about that.
@Twitter Please suspend this person’s account. They do not know the difference between humor and racism. Also, the fact that they think Coronavirus is a thing to joke about or made fun of.

@Twitter
